title: How to Create a Fake and Harmless Virus

steps.title: Run Notepad.
steps.content: Run Notepad. Notepad will allow you to input text with very little formatting. Click Start -> All Programs -> Accessories -> Notepad. [1] X Research source If you're on a Mac, use TextEdit.

steps.title: Input a small batch file.
steps.content: Input a small batch file. Put the following into your text file (without the bullets): @echo off echo Message here. [2] X Research source shutdown -s -f -t 60 -c "type a message you want to appear here."
